name: Poo´s Path
description:
There is no normal Poo´s left in the world. The Diarrhea Corp. developed a new serum which made all Poo´s to  zombie-like slaves.   They became darker and harder to sell more moist towelettes. As the  only normal Poo left in the world you try to beat  The Diarrhea Corp.

I´m currently developing the game and need your feedback. I created some random-base test levels and added already few features but if you have any good idea to make it better please contact me.
